ALBORZ.html.title: CAMP ALBORZ
paragraphs: ALBORZ is a 501c3 Non-Profit music and arts organization, supporting an inclusive and diverse community of performers and artists through events, partnerships, community involvement, mentorship and relationship building.
ALBORZ was founded to celebrate Persian Culture worldwide, through music, food and art. The legendary hospitality, without any of the baggage.

Our inclusive events foster cross-cultural understanding and community engagement. Join us in preserving and promoting the vibrant Persian culture. Our mission is to leverage our wide community reach to support efforts focused on helping our community, our country and our planet.
We gather all over the globe but coalesce around our love for hosting new and old friends at our home, in our home, Black Rock City.
Many of us live far away from our ancestral lands but we try to share the best parts of our cultural heritage with one another as well as the broader community.
"Coleman Barks, a renowned translator of Rumi's works, has beautifully captured the essence of Camp Alborz with the following Rumi quote:

'Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing, there is a field. I'll meet you there. When the soul lies down in that grass, the world is too full to talk about. Ideas, language, even the phrase 'each other' doesn't make any sense.'"

This Rumi quote speaks to the spirit of Camp Alborz, where differences and divisions dissolve, and a profound sense of unity and connection emerges. In that sacred space, where judgments and labels lose their power, our souls come alive, and we experience the profound beauty of simply being together. It's a reminder that when we transcend the constraints of language and societal constructs, we discover a boundless field of love and understanding, where we can truly meet one another in the purest essence of our shared humanity.

APPLY.html.title: CAMP ALBORZ - APPLY
paragraphs: Thanks for your interest in joining us! The Membership intake form for 2025 is here:
2025 Alborz Application

ART.html.title: CAMP ALBORZ - ART
paragraphs: As part of our mission Camp Alborz sponsors art and artists in various ways. We help bring unique and interesting pieces of art to the playa and are particularly interested in interactive pieces.
This year we will be returning with our two art cars Damavand and Homa, both with great improvements to form and function.
Bad Hatter 2024 Burning Man 2024 Honoraria Recipient Lead Artists: Winslow Porter, Neil Mendoza Berkay Daver, Will Patrick, Asli Sevinc, Chelsea...
https://www.naedesignstudio.com/burning-man
https://www.treeofficial.com/

DAMAVAND.html.title: CAMP ALBORZ - DAMAVAND
paragraphs: Damavand is the name of the largest peak in the Alborz mountainrange. For us, Alborz is our first Art Car. It is our home away from home and our way to take the Alborz spirit on the move.
In 2022 Damavand made it's debut appearance on the playa. This was a difficult year given the supply chain issues as well as so many natural and man made challenges. The custom speakers from
made their first appearance in the dust.
2023 was the year for building resiliency into Damavand. We were able to continue our tradition on Saturday night, despite the rough conditions.
In 2024 we had V3 of Alborz with a top made out of more mountainous materials.

DONATE.html.title: CAMP ALBORZ - DONATE
paragraphs: ALBORZ is a 501c3 Non-Profit music and arts organization, supporting an inclusive and diverse community of performers and artists through events, partnerships, community involvement, mentorship and relationship building.
ALBORZ was founded to celebrate Persian Culture worldwide, through music, food and art. The legendary hospitality, zest for knowledge and art.

We rely on funds from our worldwide Alborzian community to continue this mission. Many of our members spend weeks preparing for our events and projects, on and off the playa. Your financial support allows us to go further in creating unique and engaging experiences
by shoring up our efforts:
Event Production (year-round & on playa at Burning Man)
Infrastructure and maintenance
Supporting artists and art projects
Administration, fundraising and marketing costs
is a 501c3 non profit, so your donation is tax deductible. Many employers offer matched donations as well!
We can provide any official paperwork you or your company might require, so please donâ€™t hesitate to email
support@campalborz.org
Payments can be sent directly via Zelle to
payments@campalborz.org
Alternatively you might consider supporting our periodic fundraisers which detail specifically what initiatives your donation would be helping towards:
Camp Alborz 2025 Fundraiser

HOMA.html.title: CAMP ALBORZ - HOMA
paragraphs: Homa is the latest Art Car at Camp Alborz. Taking cue from the spirit of the mythological Homa Bird, it is a beautiful beast, that has risen from the ashes of it's previous life as a competitive racing mud truck.
As fate would have it, 2023 was the right year to show up to the playa with a mud truck! For 2024 the team at
is cooking up some special vocal chords, worthy of this beast.
Huma bird - Wikipedia

legends and fables, and continuing as a common motif in

MEMBERS.html.title: CAMP ALBORZ - MEMBERS
paragraphs: Congratulations! You've been
, where unforgettable adventures await under the desert sky.
To make that magic happen we need two things from you:

to help us understand the type of vehicle you are bringing, your arrival time, and other details. This information will help us set up the best camp layout possible. Only fill out this form if you are fully committed to camping with Alborz at Burning Man this year.
Please be aware that once you complete the membership form, we are asking for payment(s) to be made within 1 (one) week to officially secure your spot in the camp
. Please make sure to specify who you are making payment(s) for. Please only make payments for other
) this year and can be paid through one of the methods
The GRID fee is an optional fee to connect your RV or AC unit to the power grid. It is on an RV or AC basis so if you are sharing an RV or tent it is split between the folks connecting.
For 2025 we are keeping the Grid fee to
50 AMP RV is $500 more but they are rare, please notify us if you need this as it has to be arranged with the vendor.
Please let us know who you are sharing your grid or RV fee with if you send partial payment for these.
Preferred Payment Option:
payments@campalborz.org

WhatsApp group, where we'll start the party and keep you informed on any important updates.
Interested in learning more about Camp Alborz? Take a look at our
2025 Welcome Document.

Alborz is now a 501c3 non-profit music and arts organization supporting an inclusive and diverse community of performers and artists through events, partnerships, community involvement, mentorship and relationship building. Becoming a 501c3 gives us a lot of benefits as an organization, including tax deductions for those who make donations to the camp. If you are willing and able to contribute beyond the cost of dues, you can do so here:

THANKS.html.title: CAMP ALBORZ - THANKS
paragraphs: Thanks for your generous contribution!
We work hard to make every dollar stretch as far as possible to forward message of cultural pride, unity and joy that Alborz has come to represent!
Come back soon for updates on the projects you're helping to bring to life!
